syllabus_info.title: Cambridge International AS & A Level Accounting

subtopic.sub_topic_name: Analysis and communication of accounting information

learning_objectives.description: how to calculate the following ratios: working capital cycle (in days), net working assets to revenue (sales), interest cover, gearing ratio, earnings per share, price/earnings ratio, dividend per share, dividend yield, dividend cover
how to analyse and evaluate the results of the ratios and draw conclusions
how to make appropriate recommendations to stakeholders on the basis of the analysis undertaken
